sentences.en: Age diminishes the heart's ability to pump harder and faster under exertion.
sentences.cn: 随着年龄的增加，人在消耗体力时心脏的输血能力和输血速度会有所减弱。

sentences.en: Airlines should stand or fall on their ability to attract passengers.
sentences.cn: 航空公司的成败应该取决于它们吸引乘客的能力。

sentences.en: Both are blessed with uncommon ability to fix things.
sentences.cn: 两人在修理东西上都有一手绝活。

sentences.en: Both of them had the ability to present complex matters lucidly.
sentences.cn: 两人都具有深入浅出地表述复杂事物的能力。

sentences.en: Depression lowers the human ability to cope with disease.
sentences.cn: 抑郁症会降低人体对疾病的抵抗力。

sentences.en: Ferris has a rare ability to record her observations on paper.
sentences.cn: 费里斯具备把自己的观察结果记录下来的超强能力。

sentences.en: Few would argue that this team has experience and proven ability.
sentences.cn: 这个队伍的丰富经验和表现出来的实力是众所公认的。

sentences.en: Freezing weather in spring hampered the hens' ability to lay.
sentences.cn: 春天严寒的天气降低了母鸡的产蛋能力。

sentences.en: Hap-piness is the ability to make the most of what you have.
sentences.cn: 幸福就是有能力充分享受你拥有的一切。

sentences.en: Neil's ability to utter banalities never ceased to amaze me.
sentences.cn: 每次我都很惊讶，尼尔怎么能讲出这么索然无味的东西。

sentences.en: Nerve cells have limited ability to regenerate if destroyed.
sentences.cn: 如果受到损伤，神经细胞再造的能力有限。

sentences.en: Relentless in his pursuit of quality, his technical ability was remarkable.
sentences.cn: 对质量孜孜不倦的追求使他的技能出类拔萃。

sentences.en: The ability to separate out reusable elements from other waste is crucial.
sentences.cn: 能从其他废料中分离出可重复利用成分是很关键的。

sentences.en: The public never had faith in his ability to handle the job.
sentences.cn: 公众从来不相信他有能力胜任这一职位。

sentences.en: The test measures your mathematical ability.
sentences.cn: 这种测试考查的是数学能力。

sentences.en: They have been given college scholarships purely on athletic ability.
sentences.cn: 他们完全是凭体育特长才获得了大学奖学金。

phrases.tran_cn: 体能，体质能力；身体能力

trans.tran_en: the state of being able to do something
